training_questions.question: The trainer seemed knowledgeable of the training area.
The trainer presented the contents well.
The trainer was able to engage with the participants to make the session interactive and interesting.
The training has enabled me to put my learning into practice now or will be able to use my learning in the future.
Content was easy to understand and inline with my expectations from the session.
I would recommend this course to other team members.
The training started at the scheduled time?
I was given enough notification for the training to plan my product tasks accordingly?
The training was conducted in a conducive and well-equipped environment?
What is at least one learning that you can take from this session?
How can this training be further improved for better results â€“ give at least 1 recommendation.
Do you have any other feedback for improvement?

roundtable_questions.question: Which Practice Group do you belong to?
Which piece of information was most useful for you?
Please explain your reasons for your choice.
Which piece of information was least relevant/did not add any value in the session?
Please explain your reasons for your choice.
Please share your suggestions for anything else that you would like to be included in the RT

workshop_questions.question: Did the leadership talk succeed in setting your expectations on how to communicate hard feedback?
What were your major takeaways from the leadership talk?
Which aspects went really well during the talk? (related to delivery, content, or any other expectations)
What could have been done better? (related to delivery, content, or any other expectations)

response_header: Here is the feedback that you have submitted, you can edit any response before submitting it.
retry_prompt: Please choose correct option for the above question
I would request you to please select correct option
I am sorry but you wrote something else that is not given in the options
retry_command_prompt: This is not correct command. Please enter the valid command
This is invalid command. Please enter correct command
retry_command_edit: Invalid question number or command. Please enter the valid question or command to edit.
This seems to be a wrong question number. Please type correct command.
session_reset_msg: I have lost my memory (morningafter) please type '**Start**' to start the feedback again
not_started_msg: Hey (wait)! You have not started filling the feedback yet. Please complete the feedback and then submit
help_msg:
* If you want to edit any feedback type **'edit question_number'**. Example- edit 4 
* if you want to submit response type **'submit'** 
* If you want to reset all responses type **'restart'** 
* If you want to check all available commands type **'help'**
mail_not_sent_msg: We are not able to send your feedback to TM team. Please contact to support.
mail_sent_msg: Your feedback has been submitted, thanks for your time (bow)
reason_msg: Can you please write the reason why don't you want to fill the feedback? (chappal)
complete_all_ques_msg: Great Job! (clap) You have submitted your feedback successfully and we appreciate this. (y) What would you like to do now?
half_attempt_msg: You have completed almost half of the questions. (kya) baat hai. Here is a (trophy) for you. Let's move to the next question.
error_msg: There is some problem, please try after some time
no_option_found_error: Sorry I couldn't get you. It seems you have entered something else. Can you please try 'help' for how to proceed.
welcome1_msg: You will be presented with a list of questions. Your answer to those questions can help the trainer identify their strengths and improvement areas to serve you better.
welcome2_msg: You can type '**help**' anytime to see all available commands that I can respond to.
welcome3_msg: **I will help you in providing the feedback for the training** (wave)
feedback_fill_msg: You have just attended the session. We request you to fill the feedback ASAP.
msg_to_start_feedback: You have just attended the session. We request you to fill the feedback ASAP. What would you like to do now?
choose_start_option: What would you like to do? (** Tip :** *Please select or type the option*)
delete_bot: Bot has been deleted from the skype list
tip_restart: **Tip :** You can type **'restart'** anytime before submitting the feedback to start filling the feedback from beginning.
final_question_message:
You are almost there, one more to go.
(bhangra) (fireworks)
Here is the final question.
just_attended_notification: You have just attended the **'%s'** session. We request you to fill the feedback ASAP. Please type **'Start'** to start filling the feedback. :)
wait: Hey (wait)! You have only attempted **%s/%s** questions. Please complete your feedback and then submit
answer_update: Your **feedback of question number %s** has been updated successfully (rock)
inactive_msg: Hey **%s**, I can see that you have started filling the **'%s'** session feedback but did not complete it. I promise (promise) that it will take hardly 5 minutes (time). Please fill it ASAP otherwise I will keep bothering you. ]:)
too_fast_msg: Hey %s, you were too fast this time (wait), I would request you to please slow down else I can give you some crazy results and it will not be my fault but for now we are considering your first command.
user_not_found: Hey **%s**, Your skype user name doesn't match in our database. We will highly recommend you to change your skype name to get all the notifications of the session or contact to TM team.
user_found:
Hey **%s**, *%s* Glad you're here and thanks for adding me (highfive). I will notify and guide you to provide feedback for the sessions here itself.

**Tip :** Please type **'Start'** when you are ready to fill the feedback.
not_getting_message: Hey **%s**, I'm sorry, I don't understand!(shake) Sometimes I have an easier time with a few simple keywords. Please type **'Start'** to start filling the feedback.
no_pending_feedback: You have no pending feedback yet. Enjoy!!!  (whistle)
edit_command_hint: Please type 'edit (question number)' to edit the response. For example- **edit 1**
what_next: What would you like to do next?
subject_email: Please check the feedback in attached file-:
